name: Unmanned SA
about: Unmanned SA is a premier flying school dedicated to training the next generation of unmanned aircraft system (UAS) professionals. Our programs are designed to provide comprehensive education in the safe operations, regulations, and technology of autonomous systems. With hands-on courses and industry partnerships, students gain practical experience in building, flying, and maintaining UAS. Our curriculum includes core aerospace courses, electricity principles, computer science, and geographic information systems (GIS), preparing graduates for careers in agriculture, public safety, photography, and more. Our experienced instructors and low student-to-instructor ratios ensure personalized mentorship and a strong focus on safety. At Unmanned SA, we strive to develop a culture of safety and excellence, equipping our students with the knowledge and skills necessary to excel in the dynamic field of unmanned aviation. Join us to become a leader in the UAS industry.
